about_the_game:
Belt out "Commando!" with the third track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album, "Captain Commando - Credit - Game Start - Player Select"!

This track features two quick jingles and the music used when selecting your character in Captain Commando, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
